xYMrCUmhUZx2.name: Identity_Expiry
xYMrCUmhUZx2.title: Identity Expiry
xYMrCUmhUZx2.sqlQuery: SELECT ID.employees_id, EI.employee_id, EI.hims_d_employee_identification_id,ID.identity_document_name,ID.arabic_identity_document_name, DATEDIFF(date(EI.valid_upto),date(now())) as expire_after,E.employee_code, concat(if(T.title is not null,T.title,''),'. ', E.full_name)english_name, concat(if(T.arabic_title is not null,T.arabic_title,''),'. ', E.arabic_name)arabic_name, EI.issue_date,EI.valid_upto FROM hims_d_employee_identification as EI inner join hims_d_identity_document as ID on ID.hims_d_identity_document_id = EI.identity_documents_id inner join hims_d_employee as E on E.hims_d_employee_id =EI.employee_id left join hims_d_title as T on E.title_id = T.his_d_title_id where ID.notify_expiry='Y' and EI.is_notify = 0 and DATEDIFF(date(EI.valid_upto),date(now())) <= ID.notify_before and ID.notify_before is not null and E.record_status='A' and (EI.alert_required is null or EI.alert_required ='Y');

contractExpiry.name: contract_expiry
contractExpiry.title: Contract Expiry
contractExpiry.sqlQuery: SELECT CM.hims_f_contract_management_id,CM.contract_number, DATEDIFF(date(CM.end_date),date(now())) as expire_after, CM.end_date,CM.notification_days1,CM.notification_days2,CM.incharge_employee_id, concat(if(T.title is not null,T.title,''),'. ', E.full_name)english_name, concat(if(T.arabic_title is not null,T.arabic_title,''),'. ', E.arabic_name)arabic_name, CS.customer_name FROM hims_f_contract_management CM inner join hims_d_employee as E on E.hims_d_employee_id = CM.incharge_employee_id left join hims_d_title as T on E.title_id = T.his_d_title_id inner join hims_d_customer CS on CS.hims_d_customer_id = CM.customer_id where CM.is_notify = 0 and DATEDIFF(date(CM.end_date),date(now())) <= CM.notification_days1 and CM.notification_days1 is not null;

probationExpiry.name: probation_expiry
probationExpiry.title: Probation Expiry
probationExpiry.sqlQuery: SELECT EM.hims_d_employee_id,EM.employee_code,DATE(EM.probation_date) as probation_date,concat(if(T.title is not null,T.title,''),'. ', EM.full_name) english_name, concat(if(T.arabic_title is not null,T.arabic_title,''),'. ', EM.arabic_name)arabic_name,DATEDIFF(date(EM.probation_date),date(now())) as expire_after, EM.reporting_to_id, (select group_concat(employee_id) from algaeh_d_app_user where user_type='HR') as employees FROM hims_d_employee EM left join hims_d_title as T on T.his_d_title_id = EM.title_id where EM.is_notify = 0 and DATEDIFF(date(EM.probation_date),date(now())) <= (select probation_notify_before from hims_d_hrms_options limit 1);

quotationFollowup.name: quotation_Followup
quotationFollowup.title: Quotation Follow up
quotationFollowup.sqlQuery: SELECT SQ.hims_f_sales_quotation_id,SQ.sales_quotation_number,SQ.hims_f_sales_quotation_id,SQ.is_notify,SQ.qotation_status,SQ.created_date, SQ.sales_person_id, SQ.no_of_days_followup,concat(if(T.title is not null,T.title,''),'. ', EM.full_name) english_name, concat(if(T.arabic_title is not null,T.arabic_title,''),'. ', EM.arabic_name)arabic_name, DATEDIFF(date(now()),date(SQ.created_date)) as diff_date, CU.customer_name FROM hims_f_sales_quotation SQ inner join hims_d_employee EM on EM.hims_d_employee_id = SQ.sales_person_id inner join hims_d_customer CU on CU.hims_d_customer_id = SQ.customer_id left join hims_d_title as T on T.his_d_title_id = EM.title_id where qotation_status = 'G' and no_of_days_followup >0 and SQ.is_notify = 0 and  (DATEDIFF(date(now()),date(SQ.created_date)) = SQ.no_of_days_followup);

dentalFollowup.name: dental_Followup
dentalFollowup.title: Dental Lab Follow up
dentalFollowup.sqlQuery: select (select employees_id from hims_d_inventory_options limit 1) as employees,DL.hims_f_dental_form_id,DL.odered_date,DL.work_status,DL.is_notify,DL.full_name,DL.patient_code,DL.procedure_id,PR.procedure_desc,DL.vendor_id,VN.vendor_name,USR.employee_id,EM.full_name as orderBy from hims_f_dental_form as DL inner join hims_d_vendor VN on VN.hims_d_vendor_id=DL.vendor_id inner join hims_d_procedure PR on PR.hims_d_procedure_id=DL.procedure_id inner join algaeh_d_app_user USR on USR.algaeh_d_app_user_id=DL.updated_by inner join hims_d_employee EM on EM.hims_d_employee_id=USR.employee_id where DL.work_status ='WIP' and DL.is_notify = 0 and DATEDIFF(date(now()),date(DL.odered_date)) >= (select dental_lab_days from hims_d_inventory_options limit 1);
